title: 6-Aminocoumarin-derived Schiff base gelators: aggregation and sensing of CN−, Fe3+, Cu2+ and CO2 under different conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32759-32770
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05503A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eshani Paul, Rameez Raza, Subrata Ranjan Dhara, Nabajyoti Baildya, Kumaresh Ghosh
6-Aminocoumarin derived Schiff bases 1 and 2 show gelation in different solvents. Their DMF–H2O gels recognize CN− among other anions and selectively detect Fe3+ and Cu2+ ions via gel-to-gel colour change. CN− ensembles of 1 and 2 also detect CO2.
